Dear John Doe,

A new API key has been created for your application "foo-app" on The Things Network.

API Key ID: TEST
API Key Name: API Key Name

Rights:

- RIGHT_APPLICATION_INFO: view application information
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_SETTINGS_BASIC: edit basic application settings
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_DEVICES_READ: view devices in application
- RIGHT_APPLICATION_TRAFFIC_READ: read application traffic (uplink and downlink)

You can go to https://console.cloud.thethings.network/applications/foo-app/api-keys/TEST to view and edit this API key in the Console.
